issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: Ti.App.addEventListener does not get the object passed from Ti.App.fireEvent

comments.body: I'm not sure is this issue valid. According to some info, argument to "fireEvent" method should be JSON serializable object and Titanium objects are not for sure. I am not sure about this, because functions are not serializable, while they can be passed to "fireEvent" method. Can someone bring some light to this subject? Thanks.

Issue reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
